humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates a tumor classification of lobular carcinoma, NOS, G III, oT2N3aL1V1RX, with N3a suggesting metastases in 4 to 9 axillary lymph nodes. This corresponds to N3 based on New Rule 13 and New Rule 15.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The 'N' in TNM staging refers to the spread of cancer to nearby lymph nodes. In this report, the 'N3a' indicates that cancer has spread to 4 to 9 axillary lymph nodes or to infraclavicular (clavicle) lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N3.
